title: [Large-scale] Blended Learning Design Masterclass for Web-Based Distance Education

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science education experience and proficiency in using basic online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A course where corporate training managers practice designing blended science lessons linked to curricula, as part of a teacher training program.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design three types of learning objects (theory, practice, assessment) through object-oriented learning goal setting.
Learners can develop blended lesson scenarios combining self-directed learning, real-time video classes, and offline activities in web-based environments.
Learners can analyze the cognitive complexity of learning objectives and select appropriate instructional strategies using schematics similar to the Instruction Aid System (IAS).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
